question: Pod manifest with one initContainer that waits 5s before starting app container.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: wait
spec:
  initContainers:
  - name: init
    image: busybox
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - sleep 5
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx
